trans-unit.source: Special and Alternate Vendor Pricing and Discounts | Microsoft Docs'

seg-source.mrk: Special and Alternate Vendor Pricing and Discounts | Microsoft Docs'

target.mrk: Speciální a alternativní ceny a slevy pro dodavatele | Microsoft Docs'

trans-unit.source: You can define different or alternate prices and discount agreements and apply them to purchase documents for vendors.

seg-source.mrk: You can define different or alternate prices and discount agreements and apply them to purchase documents for vendors.

target.mrk: Můžete definovat zvláštní nebo alternativní ceny a dohody o slevách, a aplikovat je na nákupní doklady pro dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: Record Special Purchase Prices and Discounts

seg-source.mrk: Record Special Purchase Prices and Discounts

target.mrk: Zaznamenávání speciálních nákupních cen a slev

trans-unit.source: The different price and discount agreements that apply when you buy from different vendors must be defined so that the agreed rules and values are applied to purchase documents that you create for the vendors.

seg-source.mrk: The different price and discount agreements that apply when you buy from different vendors must be defined so that the agreed rules and values are applied to purchase documents that you create for the vendors.

target.mrk: Různé smlouvy o cenách a slevách, které platí při nákupu od různých dodavatelů, musí být definovány tak, aby se dohodnutá pravidla a hodnoty vztahovaly na nákupní doklady, které pro dodavatele vytvoříte.

trans-unit.source: When you have recorded special prices and line discounts for sales and purchases, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] ensures that your profit on item trade is always optimal by automatically calculating the best price on sales and purchase documents and on job and item journal lines.

seg-source.mrk: When you have recorded special prices and line discounts for sales and purchases, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] ensures that your profit on item trade is always optimal by automatically calculating the best price on sales and purchase documents and on job and item journal lines.

target.mrk: Pokud jste zaznamenali speciální ceny a řádkové slevy za prodej a nákupy, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] zajistí, že váš zisk z obchodu se zbožím je vždy optimální automatickým výpočtem nejlepší ceny na prodejních a nákupních dokladech a na řádcích deníků zboží a projektů.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Best Price Calculation](purchasing-how-record-purchase-price-discount-payment-agreements.md#best-price-calculation).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Best Price Calculation](purchasing-how-record-purchase-price-discount-payment-agreements.md#best-price-calculation).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Výpočet nejlepší ceny](purchasing-how-record-purchase-price-discount-payment-agreements.md#best-price-calculation).

trans-unit.source: Concerning prices, you can have a special purchase price inserted on purchase lines if a certain combination of vendor, item, minimum quantity, unit of measure, or starting/ending date exists.

seg-source.mrk: Concerning prices, you can have a special purchase price inserted on purchase lines if a certain combination of vendor, item, minimum quantity, unit of measure, or starting/ending date exists.

target.mrk: Pokud jde o ceny, můžete do nákupních řádků vložit speciální nákupní cenu, pokud existuje určitá kombinace dodavatele, zboží, minimálního množství, měrné jednotky nebo počátečního/koncového data.

trans-unit.source: Concerning discounts, you can set up and use two types of purchase discounts:

seg-source.mrk: Concerning discounts, you can set up and use two types of purchase discounts:

target.mrk: Pokud jde o slevy, můžete nastavit a použít dva typy nákupních slev:

trans-unit.source: Discount Type

seg-source.mrk: Discount Type

target.mrk: Typ slevy

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Popis

trans-unit.source: **Purchase Line Discount**

seg-source.mrk: Purchase Line Discount

target.mrk: Sleva nákupního řádku

trans-unit.source: An amount discount that is inserted on purchase lines if a certain combination of vendor, item, minimum quantity, unit of measure, or starting/ending date exists.

seg-source.mrk: An amount discount that is inserted on purchase lines if a certain combination of vendor, item, minimum quantity, unit of measure, or starting/ending date exists.

target.mrk: Množstevní sleva, která je vložena na nákupní řádky, pokud existuje určitá kombinace dodavatele, zboží, minimálního množství, měrné jednotky nebo počátečního/koncového data.

trans-unit.source: This works in the same way as for purchase prices.

seg-source.mrk: This works in the same way as for purchase prices.

target.mrk: Toto funguje stejně jako u nákupních cen.

trans-unit.source: **Invoice Discount**

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Discount

target.mrk: Fakturační sleva

trans-unit.source: A percentage discount that is subtracted from the document total if the value amount of all lines on a purchase document exceeds a certain minimum.

seg-source.mrk: A percentage discount that is subtracted from the document total if the value amount of all lines on a purchase document exceeds a certain minimum.

target.mrk: Procentní sleva, která se odečte od celkové částky dokladu, pokud hodnota všech řádků na nákupním dokladu přesáhne určité minimum.

trans-unit.source: Because purchase line discounts and purchase prices are based on a combination of item and vendor, you can also enter this configuration from the item card, where the rules and values are defined.

seg-source.mrk: Because purchase line discounts and purchase prices are based on a combination of item and vendor, you can also enter this configuration from the item card, where the rules and values are defined.

target.mrk: Protože slevy na nákupních řádcích a nákupní ceny jsou založeny na kombinaci zboží a dodavatele, můžete tuto konfiguraci zadat také z karty zboží, kde jsou definována pravidla a hodnoty.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Register New Items](inventory-how-register-new-items.md).

seg-source.mrk: For more information, see [Register New Items](inventory-how-register-new-items.md).

target.mrk: Pro více informací navštivte [Registrace nových položek](inventory-how-register-new-items.md).

trans-unit.source: To set up a special purchase price for a vendor

seg-source.mrk: To set up a special purchase price for a vendor

target.mrk: Chcete-li nastavit speciální nákupní cenu pro dodavatele

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Dodavatelé** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the relevant vendor card, and then choose the **Prices** action.

seg-source.mrk: Open the relevant vendor card, and then choose the **Prices** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte příslušnou kartu dodavatele a pak zvolte akci **Ceny**.

trans-unit.source: The **Purchase Type** field is prefilled with **Vendor**, and the **Purchase Code** field is prefilled with the vendor number.

seg-source.mrk: The **Purchase Type** field is prefilled with **Vendor**, and the **Purchase Code** field is prefilled with the vendor number.

target.mrk: Pole** Typ nákupu** je předvyplněno **Dodavatelem** a pole **Kód nákupu** je vyplněno číslem dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields on the line as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields on the line as necessary.

target.mrk: Vyplňte pole na řádku podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: Fill a line for each combination for which the vendor grants you a purchase line discount.

seg-source.mrk: Fill a line for each combination for which the vendor grants you a purchase line discount.

target.mrk: Vyplňte řádek pro každou kombinaci, pro kterou vám dodavatel poskytne nákupní řádkovou slevu.

trans-unit.source: To set up a line discount for a vendor

seg-source.mrk: To set up a line discount for a vendor

target.mrk: Chcete-li nastavit řádkovou slevu pro dodavatele

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Dodavatelé** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the relevant vendor card, and then choose the **Line Discounts** action.

seg-source.mrk: Open the relevant vendor card, and then choose the **Line Discounts** action.

target.mrk: Vyberte příslušnou kartu dodavatele a pak zvolte akci **Řádkové slevy**.

trans-unit.source: The **Purchase Type** field is prefilled with **Vendor**, and the **Purchase Code** field is prefilled with the vendor number.

seg-source.mrk: The **Purchase Type** field is prefilled with **Vendor**, and the **Purchase Code** field is prefilled with the vendor number.

target.mrk: Pole** Typ nákupu** je předvyplněno **Dodavatelem** a pole **Kód nákupu** je vyplněno číslem dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: Fill in the fields on the line as necessary.

seg-source.mrk: Fill in the fields on the line as necessary.

target.mrk: Vyplňte pole na řádku podle potřeby.

trans-unit.source: Fill a line for each combination for which the vendor grants you a purchase line discount.

seg-source.mrk: Fill a line for each combination for which the vendor grants you a purchase line discount.

target.mrk: Vyplňte řádek pro každou kombinaci, pro kterou vám dodavatel poskytne nákupní řádkovou slevu.

trans-unit.source: To set up an invoice discount for a vendor

seg-source.mrk: To set up an invoice discount for a vendor

target.mrk: Chcete-li nastavit slevu z faktury pro dodavatele

trans-unit.source: When your vendors have informed you which invoice discounts they grant, enter the invoice discount code on the vendor cards and set up the terms for each code.

seg-source.mrk: When your vendors have informed you which invoice discounts they grant, enter the invoice discount code on the vendor cards and set up the terms for each code.

target.mrk: Jakmile vás vaši dodavatelé informují o tom, které slevy z faktury poskytují, zadejte na kartách dodavatele kód slevy z faktury a nastavte podmínky pro každý kód.

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Vendors**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Dodavatelé** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: Open the vendor card for a vendor that will be eligible for invoice discounts.

seg-source.mrk: Open the vendor card for a vendor that will be eligible for invoice discounts.

target.mrk: Otevřete kartu dodavatele pro dodavatele, který bude mít nárok na slevy z faktury.

trans-unit.source: In the **Invoice Disc. Code** field, select a code for the relevant invoice discount terms to use to calculate invoice discounts for the vendor.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Invoice Disc.
Code** field, select a code for the relevant invoice discount terms to use to calculate invoice discounts for the vendor.

target.mrk: V části **Kód fakturační slevy
v poli Kód** vyberte kód pro příslušné podmínky slev z faktury, které chcete použít pro výpočet slev z faktury pro dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: Invoice discount codes are represented by existing vendor cards.

seg-source.mrk: Invoice discount codes are represented by existing vendor cards.

target.mrk: Kódy slev z faktury jsou představovány existujícími kartami dodavatelů.

trans-unit.source: This enables you to quickly assign invoice discount terms to vendors by picking the name of another vendors who will have the same terms.

seg-source.mrk: This enables you to quickly assign invoice discount terms to vendors by picking the name of another vendors who will have the same terms.

target.mrk: To vám umožní rychle přiřadit dodavatelům podmínky slevy z faktury výběrem jmen dalších dodavatelů, kteří budou mít stejné podmínky.

trans-unit.source: Proceed to set up new the purchase invoice discount terms.

seg-source.mrk: Proceed to set up new the purchase invoice discount terms.

target.mrk: Pokračujte v nastavování nových podmínek slevy z nákupní faktury.

trans-unit.source: On the **Vendor Card** page, choose the **Invoice Discounts** action.

seg-source.mrk: On the **Vendor Card** page, choose the **Invoice Discounts** action.

target.mrk: V okně **Karta dodavatele** vyberte akci **Fakturační slevy**.

trans-unit.source: The **Vend. Invoice Discounts** page opens.

seg-source.mrk: The **Vend.
Invoice Discounts** page opens.

target.mrk: **Dodav.
Otevře se stránka Fakturační slevy**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Currency Code** field, enter the code for a currency that the invoice discount terms on the line applies to.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Currency Code** field, enter the code for a currency that the invoice discount terms on the line applies to.

target.mrk: Do pole **Kód měny** zadejte kód měny, na kterou se vztahují podmínky slevy z faktury na řádku.

trans-unit.source: Leave the field blank to set up invoice discount terms in USD.

seg-source.mrk: Leave the field blank to set up invoice discount terms in USD.

target.mrk: Chcete-li nastavit podmínky slevy z faktury v USD, ponechte pole prázdné.

trans-unit.source: In the **Minimum Amount** field, enter the minimum amount that an invoice must have to be eligible for the discount.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Minimum Amount** field, enter the minimum amount that an invoice must have to be eligible for the discount.

target.mrk: Do pole **Minimální částka** zadejte minimální částku, kterou musí faktura obsahovat, aby vznikl nárok na slevu.

trans-unit.source: In the **Discount %** field, enter the invoice discount as a percentage of the invoice amount.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Discount %** field, enter the invoice discount as a percentage of the invoice amount.

target.mrk: Do pole **Sleva %** zadejte slevu z faktury jako procento z částky faktury.

trans-unit.source: Repeat steps 5 through 7 for each currency that the vendor will receive a different invoice discount for.

seg-source.mrk: Repeat steps 5 through 7 for each currency that the vendor will receive a different invoice discount for.

target.mrk: Opakujte kroky 5 až 7 pro každou měnu, pro kterou dodavatel obdrží jinou slevu z faktury.

trans-unit.source: The invoice discount is now set up and assigned to the vendor in question.

seg-source.mrk: The invoice discount is now set up and assigned to the vendor in question.

target.mrk: Sleva z faktury je nyní nastavena a přiřazena dotyčnému dodavateli.

trans-unit.source: When you select the vendor code in the **Invoice Disc. Code** field on other vendor cards, the same invoice discount is assigned to those vendor.

seg-source.mrk: When you select the vendor code in the **Invoice Disc.
Code** field on other vendor cards, the same invoice discount is assigned to those vendor.

target.mrk: Při výběru kódu dodavatele v části **Kód fakturační slevy
v poli Kód**, na kartách dalších dodavatelů, je těmto prodejcům přidělena stejná sleva z faktury.

trans-unit.source: To choose a principle for posting purchase discounts

seg-source.mrk: To choose a principle for posting purchase discounts

target.mrk: Pro výběr principu účtování nákupních slev

trans-unit.source: When you post a purchase invoice that includes one or more discounts, you can choose between two principles for posting discount amounts.

seg-source.mrk: When you post a purchase invoice that includes one or more discounts, you can choose between two principles for posting discount amounts.

target.mrk: Když zaúčtujete nákupní fakturu, která obsahuje jednu nebo více slev, můžete si vybrat mezi dvěma principy pro účtování částek slev.

trans-unit.source: You can post discounts separately or you can subtract discounts from invoice discounts.

seg-source.mrk: You can post discounts separately or you can subtract discounts from invoice discounts.

target.mrk: Slevy můžete účtovat samostatně nebo můžete odečíst slevy z fakturačních slev.

trans-unit.source: Before you can do this, you must have already set up the necessary accounts for posting discount amounts in the chart of accounts.

seg-source.mrk: Before you can do this, you must have already set up the necessary accounts for posting discount amounts in the chart of accounts.

target.mrk: Než to budete moci udělat, budete muset mít již zřízené účty potřebné pro účtování částek slev do účetní osnovy.

trans-unit.source: You must also check that you have entered the correct account numbers in the general posting setup in the **Purch. Line Disc. Account** and **Purch. Inv. Disc. Account** fields.

seg-source.mrk: You must also check that you have entered the correct account numbers in the general posting setup in the **Purch.
Line Disc.
Account** and **Purch.
Inv.
Disc.
Account** fields.

target.mrk: Musíte také zkontrolovat, zda jste zadali správná čísla účtů v nastavení obecného účtování v **Nák.
Řádková sleva
Účet** a **Nák.
Zás.
Sleva
Pole Uživatele**

trans-unit.source: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Purchases & Payables Setup**, and then choose the related link.

seg-source.mrk: Choose the ![Lightbulb that opens the Tell Me feature](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Tell me what you want to do") icon, enter **Purchases & Payables Setup**, and then choose the related link.

target.mrk: Vyberte ikonu ![Žárovky, která otevře funkci Řekněte mi](media/ui-search/search_small.png "Řekněte mi, co chcete dělat"), zadejte **Nastavení nákupu a závazků** a poté vyberte související odkaz.

trans-unit.source: In the **Discount Posting** field, choose one of the following principles for posting discounts.

seg-source.mrk: In the **Discount Posting** field, choose one of the following principles for posting discounts.

target.mrk: V poli **Účtování slevy** vyberte jeden z následujících principů účtování slev.

seg-source.mrk: Discount Posting Principle

target.mrk: Princip účtování slevy

seg-source.mrk: Invoice Discount

target.mrk: Fakturační sleva

seg-source.mrk: Line Discount

target.mrk: Řádková sleva

seg-source.mrk: All Discounts

target.mrk: Všechny slevy

seg-source.mrk: Posted separately

target.mrk: Účtováno samostatně

target.mrk: Účtováno samostatně

trans-unit.source: Purchase Invoice Discounts and Service Charges

seg-source.mrk: Purchase Invoice Discounts and Service Charges

target.mrk: Slevy z nákupních faktur a poplatky za služby

trans-unit.source: If you have fixed terms for invoice discounts with any vendors, you can enter them for those vendors.

seg-source.mrk: If you have fixed terms for invoice discounts with any vendors, you can enter them for those vendors.

target.mrk: Pokud máte u jakýchkoli dodavatelů pevně stanovené podmínky pro slevy z faktury, můžete je pro tyto dodavatele zadat.

trans-unit.source: Then the discount will be calculated when you fill in a purchase invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Then the discount will be calculated when you fill in a purchase invoice.

target.mrk: Sleva se poté vypočítá při vyplnění nákupní faktury.

trans-unit.source: Before you can use invoice discounts with purchases, you must specify the vendors that offer you the discounts.

seg-source.mrk: Before you can use invoice discounts with purchases, you must specify the vendors that offer you the discounts.

target.mrk: Než budete moci u nákupů použít fakturační slevy, musíte určit dodavatele, kteří vám slevy nabízejí.

trans-unit.source: You link discount percentages to specific invoice amounts in **Vend. Invoice Discounts** pages.

seg-source.mrk: You link discount percentages to specific invoice amounts in **Vend.
Invoice Discounts** pages.

target.mrk: Procenta slev s konkrétními částkami faktury propojíte v sekci **Dodav.
Stránky Fakturační slevy**.

trans-unit.source: You can enter any number of percentages in each page.

seg-source.mrk: You can enter any number of percentages in each page.

target.mrk: Na každou stránku můžete zadat libovolný počet procent.

trans-unit.source: Each vendor can have its own page, or you can link several vendors to the same page.

seg-source.mrk: Each vendor can have its own page, or you can link several vendors to the same page.

target.mrk: Každý dodavatel může mít svou vlastní stránku, nebo můžete ke stejné stránce připojit několik dodavatelů.

trans-unit.source: In addition to a discount percentage, you can link a service charge amount to a specific invoice amount.

seg-source.mrk: In addition to a discount percentage, you can link a service charge amount to a specific invoice amount.

target.mrk: Kromě procenta slevy můžete také spojit částku poplatku za služby s konkrétní částkou faktury.

trans-unit.source: You can define the terms of the invoice discount in LCY for domestic vendors and in foreign currency for foreign vendors.

seg-source.mrk: You can define the terms of the invoice discount in LCY for domestic vendors and in foreign currency for foreign vendors.

target.mrk: Podmínky slevy z faktury můžete definovat v LM pro domácí dodavatele a v cizí měně pro zahraniční dodavatele.

trans-unit.source: You can choose to have [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] automatically calculate the invoice discounts for quotes, blanket orders, orders, invoices, or credit memos.

seg-source.mrk: You can choose to have [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] automatically calculate the invoice discounts for quotes, blanket orders, orders, invoices, or credit memos.

target.mrk: Můžete si vybrat, zda chcete aby [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] automaticky vypočítal slevy na fakturách pro nabídky, hromadné objednávky, objednávky, faktury nebo dobropisy.

trans-unit.source: Before you enter this information, it is a good idea to prepare an outline of the discount structure that you want to use.

seg-source.mrk: Before you enter this information, it is a good idea to prepare an outline of the discount structure that you want to use.

target.mrk: Před zadáním těchto informací je vhodné připravit osnovu struktury slev, kterou chcete použít.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to see which vendors can be linked to the same invoice discount page.

seg-source.mrk: This makes it easier to see which vendors can be linked to the same invoice discount page.

target.mrk: Díky tomu je snazší zjistit, kteří dodavatelé mohou být spojeni se stejnou stránkou slevy z faktury.

trans-unit.source: The fewer pages that you have to set up, the faster that you can enter the basic information.

seg-source.mrk: The fewer pages that you have to set up, the faster that you can enter the basic information.

target.mrk: Čím méně stránek musíte nastavit, tím rychleji můžete zadat základní informace.

trans-unit.source: Best Price Calculation

seg-source.mrk: Best Price Calculation

target.mrk: Výpočet nejlepší ceny

trans-unit.source: When you have recorded special prices and line discounts for sales and purchases, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] ensures that your profit on item trade is always optimal by automatically calculating the best price on sales and purchase documents and on job and item journal lines.

seg-source.mrk: When you have recorded special prices and line discounts for sales and purchases, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] ensures that your profit on item trade is always optimal by automatically calculating the best price on sales and purchase documents and on job and item journal lines.

target.mrk: Pokud jste zaznamenali speciální ceny a řádkové slevy za prodej a nákupy, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] zajistí, že váš zisk z obchodu se zbožím je vždy optimální automatickým výpočtem nejlepší ceny na prodejních a nákupních dokladech a na řádcích deníků zboží a projektů.

trans-unit.source: The best price is the lowest permissible price with the highest permissible line discount on a given date.

seg-source.mrk: The best price is the lowest permissible price with the highest permissible line discount on a given date.

target.mrk: Nejlepší cena je nejnižší přípustná cena s nejvyšší přípustnou řádkovou slevou k danému datu.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] automatically calculates this when it inserts the unit price and the line discount percentage for items on new document and journal lines.

seg-source.mrk: automatically calculates this when it inserts the unit price and the line discount percentage for items on new document and journal lines.

target.mrk: automaticky toto vypočítá, když vloží jednotkovou cenu a procento řádkové slevy pro zboží na nových řádcích dokladu a deníku.

trans-unit.source: The following describes how the best price is calculated for sales.

seg-source.mrk: The following describes how the best price is calculated for sales.

target.mrk: Následující text popisuje, jak je pro prodej vypočítána nejlepší cena.

trans-unit.source: The calculation is the same for purchases.

seg-source.mrk: The calculation is the same for purchases.

target.mrk: Výpočet je stejný pro nákupy.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] checks the combination of the bill-to customer and the item and then calculates the applicable unit price and line discount percentage, using the following criteria:

seg-source.mrk: checks the combination of the bill-to customer and the item and then calculates the applicable unit price and line discount percentage, using the following criteria:

target.mrk: zkontroluje kombinaci plátce a zboží a poté vypočítá použitelnou jednotkovou cenu a procentuální řádkovou slevu pomocí následujících kritérií:

trans-unit.source: Does the customer have a price/discount agreement, or does the customer belong to a group that does?

seg-source.mrk: Does the customer have a price/discount agreement, or does the customer belong to a group that does?

target.mrk: Má zákazník dohodu o cenách/slevách, nebo patří do skupiny, která má ?

trans-unit.source: Is the item or the item discount group on the line included in any of these price/discount agreements?

seg-source.mrk: Is the item or the item discount group on the line included in any of these price/discount agreements?

target.mrk: Je zboží nebo skupina slev zboží na řádku zahrnuta v některé z těchto dohod o cenách/slevách ?

trans-unit.source: Is the order date (or the posting date for the invoice and credit memo) within the starting and ending date of the price/discount agreement?

seg-source.mrk: Is the order date (or the posting date for the invoice and credit memo) within the starting and ending date of the price/discount agreement?

target.mrk: Je datum objednávky (nebo datum zaúčtování faktury a dobropisu) v rozmezí počátečního a koncového data dohody o ceně/slevě ?

trans-unit.source: Is a unit of measure code specified?

seg-source.mrk: Is a unit of measure code specified?

target.mrk: Je zadán kód měrné jednotky?

trans-unit.source: If so, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] checks for prices/discounts with the same unit of measure code, and prices/discounts with no unit of measure code.

seg-source.mrk: If so, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] checks for prices/discounts with the same unit of measure code, and prices/discounts with no unit of measure code.

target.mrk: Pokud ano, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] zkontrolujte ceny/slevy se stejným kódem měrné jednotky a ceny/slevy bez kódu měrné jednotky.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] checks if any price/discount agreements apply to information on the document or journal line, and then inserts the applicable unit price and line discount percentage, using the following criteria:

seg-source.mrk: checks if any price/discount agreements apply to information on the document or journal line, and then inserts the applicable unit price and line discount percentage, using the following criteria:

target.mrk: zkontroluje, zda se nějaké dohody o ceně/slevě nevztahují na informace v dokladu nebo v řádku deníku a poté vloží příslušné jednotkové ceny a procentuální řádkovou slevu, a to pomocí následujících kritérií:

trans-unit.source: Is there a minimum quantity requirement in the price/discount agreement that is fulfilled?

seg-source.mrk: Is there a minimum quantity requirement in the price/discount agreement that is fulfilled?

target.mrk: Existuje v dohodě o ceně/slevě požadavek na minimální množství, který je splněn?

trans-unit.source: Is there a currency requirement in the price/discount agreement that is fulfilled?

seg-source.mrk: Is there a currency requirement in the price/discount agreement that is fulfilled?

target.mrk: Existuje v dohodě o ceně/slevě požadavek na měnu, který je splněn?

trans-unit.source: If so, the lowest price and the highest line discount for that currency are inserted, even if LCY would provide a better price.

seg-source.mrk: If so, the lowest price and the highest line discount for that currency are inserted, even if LCY would provide a better price.

target.mrk: Pokud ano, vloží se nejnižší cena a nejvyšší řádková sleva pro tuto měnu, i když by LM poskytla lepší cenu.

trans-unit.source: If there is no price/discount agreement for the specified currency code, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] inserts the lowest price and the highest line discount in LCY.

seg-source.mrk: If there is no price/discount agreement for the specified currency code, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] inserts the lowest price and the highest line discount in LCY.

target.mrk: Pokud pro zadaný kód měny neexistuje dohoda o ceně/slevě, [!INCLUDE[d365fin](includes/d365fin_md.md)] vloží nejnižší cenu a nejvyšší řádkovou slevu v LM.

trans-unit.source: If no special price can be calculated for the item on the line, then either the last direct cost or the unit price from the item card is inserted.

seg-source.mrk: If no special price can be calculated for the item on the line, then either the last direct cost or the unit price from the item card is inserted.

target.mrk: Pokud pro zboží na řádku nelze vypočítat žádnou speciální cenu, je vložen buď poslední přímý náklad, nebo jednotková cena z karty zboží.

trans-unit.source: See Also

seg-source.mrk: See Also

target.mrk: Viz také

target.mrk: Nastavení Nákupu
